content: lion brand pattern # 40458 *ccw-prismbag pdf* skill level easy level 2 color waves article #940 *discontinued* 250 yards crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm split ring stitch markers two 4½ \ 11 5 cm diameter round plastic lids coffee can type pointed tip craft scissors or curved nail scissors emery board or fine sandpaper the body of this bag is a rectangle the ends are 2 triangles and 2 round handles are attached with self casings coffee can lids are used for handle shapes *free registration at site required to access patterns *
